name: Corgi Engine/Daz Studio Test Project
description:
Testing out the Corgi Engine in Unity, using Daz Studio graphics. You can play in browser, or download. 

(I've had one person comment on the game not playing on their browser, if this is happening for anyone else, please let me know). 

WASD for movement, and to crouch. Spacebar to jump. F key to dash. Crouch and jump to jump down on some platforms. You can kill enemies by dashing into them, or jumping on them Mario style. 

Works best with a gamepad. South button to jump, North button to dash. 

I'm planning on uploading the assets when I'm done so people can use them to make their own games, if they so choose.
